title: BONUS: Why Howard Schultz would make a terrible president
description: Former Starbucks CEO Howard Schultz says he’s seriously considering running for President. Nick Hanauer, who knows Schultz, says that businesspeople often make terrible politicians.
itunes:title: BONUS: Why Howard Schultz would make a terrible president
itunes:author: Civic Ventures
itunes:summary: Former Starbucks CEO Howard Schultz says he’s seriously considering running for President. Nick Hanauer, who knows Schultz, says that businesspeople often make terrible politicians.
